messages.messageBody:
Hi Joshua,

I'm not Stephenie but I thought I'd let you know that I've been using
alladvantage for a long time now. I make about $20 a month. There are also
other programs that you can use along with it...including this email program.
If anyone is interested I can send them an email with all the different
programs I belong to. It makes sense to make money if you're going to be
online anyway. They just pay you part of the ad money they collect. It'd be
great if tv worked this way. :)

~Heather

---------------------------------------------
